user.description: The login name for your Snowflake user.

password.description: The password for your Snowflake user.

database.description: The initial database for the Snowflake session.

schema.description: The initial schema for the Snowflake session.

warehouse.description: The initial warehouse for the session.

role.description: The initial role for the session.

stream_maps.description: Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out [Stream Maps](https://sdk.meltano.com/en/latest/stream_maps.html).

stream_map_config.description: User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.

flattening_enabled.description: 'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.

flattening_max_depth.description: The max depth to flatten schemas.
